description: The Supreme Court acquitted a man after a decade on death row in a rape-murder case, citing a flawed police investigation with planted evidence and an unfair trial. The bench criticized the Uttarakhand police for fabricating evidence and the trial court for its biased proceedings.
title: 'Cops planted evidence': SC acquits death row convict after a decade

description: West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee pledged to regularize the jobs of eligible teaching and non-teaching staff affected by the Supreme Court's verdict on the SSC recruitment scam, even risking jail. She assured them of alternative plans to avoid service breaks and promised to complete the process within two months.
title: Didi: Ready to go to jail to ensure eligible teachers don't lose jobs

description: Nikhil Gupta, an Indian national accused of plotting to assassinate Sikh separatist Gurpatwant Singh Pannun, will face trial in New York on November 3. The trial, initially expected to last two weeks, has been limited to one week by the US district judge.
title: Pannun plot: Indian national Nikhil Gupta's trial to begin in Nov

description: Global stock markets plummeted following Donald Trump's tariff announcements, sparking recession fears. Dalal Street mirrored this downturn, with Sensex and Nifty falling sharply, eroding investor wealth significantly. Foreign funds led the sell-off, though domestic investors provided some support. Experts suggest India's strong domestic economy might offer some insulation from the global turmoil, with potential rate cuts on the horizon.
title: Trump's tariffs trigger meltdown: The Lal Street bleeds in reciprocal rampage

description: In Kolkata's Thakurpukur, director Siddhant Das, allegedly intoxicated, drove his SUV into a crowded market, resulting in the death of a vegetable vendor and critically injuring eight others. Enraged locals vandalized the vehicle and assaulted Das before police intervened and arrested him.
title: 1 killed, 8 hurt as ‘drunk’ film director crashes SUV in Kolkata

description: Union Home Minister Amit Shah announced the deployment of advanced electronic surveillance systems and technological initiatives to bolster border security during his visit to Jammu and Kashmir. These measures include tunnel detection and anti-drone technology. Shah also met with families of slain policemen, offering support and recognizing the BSF's crucial role as the first line of defense.
title: E-surveillance will boost border security: Shah in J&K

description: The government has increased LPG prices for all categories, including Ujjwala beneficiaries, and raised the special additional excise duty on petrol and diesel by Rs 2 per litre.
title: Govt raises LPG price for all categories; special excise duty on petrol, diesel
MAGA billionaires balk at Donald Trump's tariff gambit, warn of 'economic nuclear winter'

description: India is developing a military space doctrine expected within months, according to Chief of Defence Staff General Anil Chauhan. This initiative responds to China's growing space warfare capabilities and aims to establish a robust "space culture" within India. The doctrine will guide the Defence Space Agency and inform a national military space policy, fostering innovation and strategic capabilities.
title: 'Military space doctrine' in 2-3 months: CDS Anil Chauhan amid China push

description: In 2009, a Dalit girl's tragic death led to a conviction for rape and murder, later overturned by the Supreme Court in 2024. The SC cited inadequate legal assistance during the trial, raising questions about judicial training and police investigation.
title: Rape-murder: SC acquits man sent to gallows by trial court

description: Elon Musk subtly criticized tariffs, seemingly disagreeing with the Trump administration's policies. He shared a video of economist Milton Friedman explaining the complex global supply chain behind a simple pencil, highlighting the importance of free markets. This followed Musk's public remarks mocking economic advisor Peter Navarro, a strong proponent of tariffs, suggesting a clear difference in economic perspectives.
title: How Elon Musk may have just said that Tariffs don't work without actually saying or writing a single word

description: Amidst market turmoil, US President Donald Trump remains firm on his tariff policy, dismissing concerns from economists and market anxieties. He threatened China with increased tariffs if it doesn't reverse its trade practices by April 8th, 2025. Financial markets reacted sharply, with the S&P 500 briefly entering bear market territory.
title: 'Resetting the table': Trump says he won’t pause tariffs as markets reel

description: Donald Trump has issued a stern warning to Iran, hinting at potential military action if diplomatic efforts to curb its nuclear ambitions fail. Direct talks are scheduled, but Iran's Supreme Leader remains opposed. Tensions escalate as Iran enriches uranium, nearing weapons-grade levels.
title: Trump warns Iran of 'great danger' if nuclear deal collapses

description: As Canada gears up for its 45th federal election, a notable shift is occurring within the Indian diaspora. While Punjabi-Canadians have long dominated South Asian political engagement, this election sees a surge of Gujarati-origin candidates entering the political arena.
title: Gujaratis step into space long shaped by Punjabis in Canadian politics

description: Royal Challengers Bengaluru ended their decade-long losing streak at Wankhede Stadium, defeating Mumbai Indians by 12 runs in a thrilling IPL match. Bengaluru posted a strong 221-5, propelled by Virat Kohli, Rajat Patidar, and Jitesh Sharma. Despite a valiant effort from Hardik Pandya and Tilak Varma, Mumbai fell short, losing key wickets in the final overs.
title: IPL: After Chepauk, RCB end another long-term drought at Wankhede

description: Several Muslim organizations, including DMK, Jamiat Ulama-e-Hind, AIMPLB, and Samastha Kerala Jamiathul Ulema, have challenged the constitutional validity of the Waqf (Amendment) Act in the Supreme Court. The petitions primarily object to the elimination of the 'waqf by user' provision and allege the "ouster of Muslims" from waqf management, claiming violations of fundamental rights and religious freedom.
title: SC plays by 'no mention' rule, no urgent Waqf pleas listing

description: The Supreme Court expressed strong disapproval of the Uttar Pradesh police for routinely filing FIRs in civil disputes, highlighting a breakdown of the rule of law. The court directed the state's Director General of Police to submit an affidavit and summoned an investigating officer to explain the misuse of criminal law in a money dispute case from Noida.
title: Rule of law appears to have completely broken down in UP, says SC

description: J&K Chief Minister Omar Abdullah's morning walk with Union Minister Kiran Rijiju sparked opposition uproar in the assembly. This occurred after the rejection of a motion to discuss the Waqf law, which Rijiju piloted in Parliament.
title: After tulip stroll with Rijiju, Waqf thorns sprout for Omar Abdullah

description: Amidst tightening US immigration policies under President Trump, foreign tech workers are increasingly anxious. Tech giants are advising visa holders against international travel due to re-entry concerns. Law firms anticipate higher rejection rates for H-1B visas and Green Cards. Elon Musk's call for more skilled immigrants highlights a divide between tech leaders and those favoring reduced immigration.
title: H-1B travel advisory: Why tech giants are warning non-US citizen employees

description: Royal Challengers Bengaluru defeated Mumbai Indians by 12 runs in IPL 2025. Krunal Pandya's brilliant bowling performance was the game changer. He took 4 wickets, including that of his brother Hardik. Rajat Patidar and Virat Kohli scored 64 and 67 respectively for RCB. Hardik and Tilak Varma fought hard for MI.
title: IPL: Krunal 4-for floors brother Hardik Pandya's Mumbai Indians

description: The global oil market is facing turbulence following the US's implementation of new tariffs on numerous countries, impacting Russia's budget. Brent crude oil futures have plummeted to their lowest level since April 2021. Kremlin Spokesman Dmitry Peskov expressed concern over the market volatility and assured that Russia is taking measures to safeguard its economy.
title: Russia 'monitoring situation closely' as oil prices fall after Trump's tariff

description: British Minister Hamish Falconer strongly condemned Israel's denial of entry to two British MPs, Yuan Yang and Abtisam Mohamed, despite prior clearance. Detained for six hours upon arrival, they were later flown back to the UK. Falconer highlighted this unprecedented action against democratically elected officials from a partner nation.
title: 'Unacceptable': UK slams Israel over detention of British MPs
An international student sues over unilateral SEVIS termination

description: An IndiGo flight 6E 5324, carrying 225 passengers from Jaipur to Mumbai, made an emergency landing at Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport around 8:50 pm on April 7 following a bomb threat. A note indicating a bomb threat was discovered in one of the aircraft's lavatories.
title: Bomb threat found in IndiGo toilet: Aircraft makes full emergency landing in Mumbai

description: Rohit Sharma's struggles in IPL 2025 continued as he was dismissed for 17 against RCB, marking his highest score of the season but still a disappointing outing. After missing a match due to injury, Rohit showed early promise with a six and two boundaries, but fell to a sharp inswinger.
title: BOWLED! Rohit Sharma's flop show continues in IPL 2025. Watch

description: Hollywood icon Tom Cruise is back as Ethan Hunt, the indomitable secret agent who has been dodging death and defying gravity. The official trailer for Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning, the much-anticipated eighth instalment in the franchise, has finally dropped — and it’s nothing short of electrifying.
title: 'Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning' trailer out

description: Nationwide protests erupted across the US against President Trump's policies, marking the largest coordinated demonstration since he took office. Tech billionaire Elon Musk criticized the protesters, alleging manipulation by "puppetmasters," citing a viral video of demonstrators struggling to articulate their reasons for labeling Trump a fascist. The "Hands Off" rallies, encompassing over 1,200 demonstrations, opposed various administration initiatives.
title: Musk shares 'biggest problem' with Donald Trump's 'fascist' protesters

description: Pawan Kalyan's convoy in Visakhapatnam allegedly disrupted traffic, causing over 25 students to miss a crucial Joint Entrance Examination. Parents claim traffic restrictions for the deputy CM's passage led to late arrival and denied entry, potentially jeopardizing an academic year.
title: Pawan Kalyan's convoy cost over 25 students their exam attempt, parents blame
Trump govt accused of 'manipulating markets' through tariff pause rumor: Here's what happened

description: President Trump escalated trade tensions with China, threatening additional tariffs if Beijing doesn't retract its retaliatory measures. He also declared an end to talks with China until the trade deficit is addressed, while demanding reparations from Europe. The US stock market experienced volatility, and Trump urged Americans to remain strong amidst the economic uncertainty.
title: Trump turns up the heat on China in hostile trade war

description: Virat Kohli was greeted with an overwhelming reception at Wankhede Stadium during the RCB-MI clash in IPL 2025, as the crowd's roar reached a record-breaking 138 decibels. Echoing the frenzy usually reserved for MS Dhoni, Kohli responded with a brilliant innings of 67 runs. He also became the first Indian to surpass 13,000 T20 runs, solidifying his legendary status.
title: Wankhede roars! Noise hits 138 dB as Kohli gets Dhoni-like welcome

description: West Bengal's political arena is ablaze once more as BJP and TMC clash over the school jobs case, impacting 25,753 teachers. The Calcutta High Court's annulment of appointments due to fraud has triggered a blame game, with BJP demanding Mamata Banerjee's resignation and accusing her nephew of corruption.
title: 'Dirty game': Mamata tries to woo sacked teachers as BJP piles pressure

description: Sundar Pichai, Alphabet's CEO, sold $5.15 million in Class C stock under a pre-arranged trading plan as the company's shares declined by 20% year-to-date. Despite this, analysts remain optimistic about Google's future, citing its strong financial health and strategic investments in AI. The Pichai Family Foundation also has a trading plan to sell shares through April 2026.
title: Google CEO sells stock worth $5.15 million under this ‘trading plan’

description: The US Supreme Court has denied Tahawwur Rana's plea to halt his extradition to India, where he faces charges for his role in the 2008 Mumbai terror attacks. Rana, a Canadian citizen of Pakistani origin, is accused of aiding David Headley in scouting targets for the Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) operation.
title: US top court rejects Tahawwur Rana's plea to stay extradition

description: Shreyas Iyer, leading Punjab Kings, faced an emotional setback during Champions Trophy 2025 practice, shedding tears over poor net performance despite previous success against England. However, he bounced back, becoming vital for India, notably scoring 48 in the final. In IPL 2025, his team suffered a 50-run defeat to Rajasthan Royals, with Iyer's early dismissal contributing to Punjab's top-order collapse.
title: 'Very rude, very rude': Shreyas Iyer criticised for attitude – Watch

description: Virat Kohli achieved a historic milestone by becoming the first Indian to surpass 13,000 runs in T20 cricket during an IPL 2025 match against Mumbai Indians. He scored 67 runs, reaching his second half-century of the season. Kohli now stands fifth globally in T20 runs, joining the ranks of Chris Gayle, Alex Hales, Shoaib Malik, and Kieron Pollard.
title: Virat Kohli becomes first Indian to climb Mt 13K in T20 cricket

description: Amidst a tumultuous 2025 marked by a significant stock market crash triggered by Trump's tariffs, Warren Buffett's net worth has uniquely increased by $12.7 billion, reaching $155 billion. While other billionaires experienced substantial losses, Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway strategically reduced tech holdings.
title: Warren Buffett defies market trend, gains $12.7bn in net worth

description: Elon Musk's wealth sees a drop after tariff announcements. Despite an $11 billion loss, Musk remains the world's richest person in 2025. His net worth stands at $330 billion. Neil deGrasse Tyson illustrates this wealth. He calculates that Musk's money in hundred-dollar bills could circle Earth thrice. The leftover amount could reach the Moon.
title: $110 bn wiped from Musk's wealth in 2025: Astrophysicist reveals fact

description: Global financial markets experienced a significant downturn, erasing trillions in equity value due to President Trump's tariffs. Major indices entered bear market territory, with stocks, commodities, and crypto plummeting as investors sought safety in Treasuries and the yen. Recession fears are escalating, prompting market volatility and concerns about the Federal Reserve's response.
title: $9.5 trillion and counting: How Trump's 'Chart of Death' has upended world markets

description: The White House refuted reports of President Trump considering a 90-day tariff pause, labeling the news as "fake." Market turbulence ensued after a social media post misinterpreted Kevin Hassett's comments, suggesting a potential suspension for all nations except China.
title: 90-day pause on tariffs? What White House said
Business leaders Dimon, Ackman turn on Trump as trade war escalates

description: Just before the New York stock market crashed, with the S&P 500 opening 3.2% lower, Donald Trump asserted that America should have implemented tariff reforms decades ago. He urged people to remain strong and courageous. The market selloff saw the S&P 500 experience its worst performance since March 2020, with significant declines across European and Asian markets as well.
title: 'Don't be weak', Trump tells Americans amid US market turmoil

description: Delhi experienced its first heatwave this season, with temperatures soaring to 40.2 degrees Celsius, prompting an IMD yellow alert for the next two days. Safdarjung, Ridge, and Ayanagar stations recorded heatwave conditions. A temperature drop is expected after April 10 due to a western disturbance. The city's Air Quality Index remained in the 'poor' category.
title: First heatwave of 2025: Delhi temperatures soar above 40° C

description: During an IPL 2025 match between Mumbai Indians and Royal Challengers Bengaluru, Jasprit Bumrah and Virat Kohli shared a lighthearted moment, showcasing their mutual respect with a playful interaction. Kohli, who earlier welcomed Bumrah back with a six, achieved a milestone by becoming the first Indian to surpass 13,000 T20 runs, marking another achievement in his career.
title: Jasprit Bumrah's bromance moment with Virat Kohli. Watch viral video

description: Jamie Dimon addresses both the potential economic challenges and legitimate reasons for President Trump's tariffs. He emphasizes the importance of quick resolution and expresses confidence in America's resilience despite possible short-term inflation and uncertainty regarding interest rates and fiscal deficits.
title: JPMorgan Chase CEO's 60-page shareholders letter has warning and promises
US storms, 'devastating' flooding death toll climbs to 17

description: Jasprit Bumrah made a fiery return from injury, hitting speeds over 140 kmph against Royal Challengers Bengaluru. Virat Kohli, however, quickly countered, smashing Bumrah for a massive six in the fourth over. Despite Kohli's aggressive approach, Bumrah maintained control, conceding only 10 runs in the over, continuing their enthralling IPL rivalry.
title: Virat Kohli takes on Jasprit Bumrah, hits a six off first ball. Watch!

description: WWE's Monday Night Raw on April 7, 2025, promises a thrilling episode from Minneapolis, streaming on Netflix. Lyra Valkyria defends her Women's Intercontinental Title against Bayley. Seth Rollins returns amidst tension with CM Punk and Roman Reigns before their WrestleMania triple-threat match, with Paul Heyman in tow. Plus, Penta and Dominik Mysterio will clash in a highly anticipated one-on-one encounter.
title: WWE Monday Night RAW: Full match card, how to watch, and more

description: Jasprit Bumrah returned after injury during Mumbai Indians' match against Royal Challengers Bengaluru. He bowled almost every delivery over 140 kmph. Virat Kohli hit a six off Bumrah. Bumrah conceded 10 runs in his first over. His return is a boost for Mumbai Indians and India.
title: 140 kmph +… : Jasprit Bumrah sets speed gun on fire in his first over
'Are you real?': What prompted SC judges' poser to lawyer

description: A 40-year-old software engineer, Prashanth Nair, allegedly died by suicide at his apartment in North Bengaluru on April 4th. He had been living alone after separating from his wife due to marital discord. Police found no death note and have registered a case of unnatural death. Investigations are ongoing.
title: Bengaluru techie dies by suicide amid marital dispute

description: President Trump claims there is no inflation in the US, asserting that oil, food prices, and interest rates are down. Despite global markets facing sharp declines and China imposing additional tariffs on US imports, Trump calls out China for its trade practices.
title: 'Biggest abuser': Trump guns for China again amid trade war

description: Jasprit Bumrah has been named in the playing XI for MI vs RCB in IPL 2025, just as it was confirmed a day prior by the team head coach Mahela Jayawardene. Bumrah will take the field after more than three months due to an injury layoff. His return is a huge boost to MI, especially after their disappointing start with three losses in four matches this season.
title: Bumrah returns after 93 days: MI seamer named in playing XI vs RCB

description: The Supreme Court has criticized the Uttar Pradesh Police for improperly converting civil disputes into criminal cases, highlighting a breakdown of the rule of law. The court directed top police officials in Gautam Budh Nagar to explain why criminal proceedings were initiated in a financial dispute case.
title: 'Complete breakdown of rule of law': Why SC pulled up UP Police

description: The Congress party criticized the central government for increasing petrol, diesel, and LPG cylinder prices. They labeled PM Modi as the "inflation man" and accused the government of exploiting the public amidst a stock market downturn. The hike comes despite a 41% drop in international crude oil prices since May 2014.
title: Congress attacks PM over LPG & fuel excise duty hike, shares old video

description: The government of India has increased the price of LPG cylinders by Rs 50, taking the cost for Ujjwala scheme beneficiaries from Rs 500 to Rs 550, and for general users from Rs 803 to Rs 853. Union petroleum minister Hardeep Puri stated the hike aims to offset oil marketing companies' Rs 43,000 crore losses.
title: Cooking gas price increased by Rs 50 per cylinder

description: Elon Musk raises concerns about population decline in prosperous civilizations, highlighting historical trends like the Roman Empire's failure to address low birth rates. He attributes modern population collapse to hedonism and envy overpowering the desire for children. Musk warns that declining populations in Asian countries like South Korea, Japan, and Singapore pose significant threats to humanity's future.
title: Elon Musk compares current population decline with Romans

description: Former cricketer Basit Ali has called for the resignation of Pakistan's selection committee after the team's poor performance in a recent ODI series against New Zealand. He criticized the selections and suggested organizing a T10 tournament to improve players' skills. The Pakistani team's recent performance and strategy were also critiqued following their Champions Trophy group stage exit.
title: 'Even tomato seller knows better than Pakistan board': Basit Ali

description: The Central government increased excise duty by Rs 2 each on petrol and diesel, with petrol duty reaching Rs 13 per litre and diesel Rs 10. Retail prices are unlikely to change as the hike will likely offset the decrease in international oil prices. New rates are effective from April 8.
title: Fuel excise duty hiked by Rs 2: Why it won't impact consumers
Germany: Schools closed over extremist right threats

description: Judicial custody for Ranya Rao and others in the gold smuggling case extends to April 21, as the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence's investigation revealed Rao smuggled 14.56 kg of gold, causing Rs 4.45 crore customs duty loss. Arrested on March 3, Rao's bail applications were consistently denied due to the gravity of the charges, with proceedings under Section 108 underway.
title: Gold smuggling case: Ranya Rao custody extended till April 21

description: Union home minister Amit Shah announced the deployment of electronic surveillance systems along the Line of Control between India and Pakistan to detect and prevent cross-border tunnels and intrusions in Jammu and Kashmir. He emphasized the importance of new technology in enhancing security and the dedication of Border Security Forces in guarding the borders year-round.
title: How India plans to dismantle 'terror tunnels' along LoC

description: Mumbai Indians will take on Royal Challengers Bengaluru in a highly anticipated IPL 2025 match at Wankhede Stadium. Key battles include Kohli vs Bumrah and the rivalry between Kohli and Rohit Sharma. Kohli has scored 97 runs in three matches this season, while Bumrah returns from injury. Historically, MI have dominated RCB at Wankhede.
title: How Virat Kohli, Jasprit Bumrah & Rohit Sharma fared in MI vs RCB IPL clash

description: Rahul Gandhi criticized PM Modi, urging India to build a resilient, production-based economy amid US tariffs troubles. He highlighted Trump's tariffs causing global market volatility and impacting India's financial markets. Gandhi emphasized on benefiting all Indians and not just a tiny minority involved in the stock market, aiming for equitable economic growth.
title: 'India has to accept reality': Rahul slams PM Modi over Trump tariffs

description: Mumbai Indians received a significant boost as Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma returned for their IPL 2025 clash against Royal Challengers Bengaluru. Hardik Pandya, after winning the toss, opted to bowl first, emphasising the need for rhythm and smarter decision-making. RCB, led by Rajat Patidar, remained unchanged, confident in their bowlers on the Mumbai pitch.
title: Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma give us added fuel: Hardik Pandya

description: Akhilesh Yadav criticized the Uttar Pradesh government for allegedly fostering a hidden force to harass and insult people, and sheltering corrupt officials. He accused the BJP of neglecting farmers and worsening the stray cattle crisis, and reiterated claims of the BJP’s extensive land grabbing in the state.
title: 'Just like Hitler had troopers, BJP has underground force': Akhilesh slams UP govt

description: Actor Dia Mirza denies allegations by Telangana CMO of spreading AI-generated fake content about a land dispute near Hyderabad Central University. The Telangana government is seeking an investigation into the misuse of AI-generated content, which has fueled controversy and protests among students.
title: Kanche Gachibowli land row: Dia Mirza denies sharing fake AI content; govt moves HC

description: Indian stock markets experienced a significant downturn, mirroring global market anxieties fueled by US tariffs and recession fears. The Sensex and Nifty witnessed their steepest single-day fall in months, eroding investor wealth substantially. While experts anticipate continued volatility, they remain optimistic about India's long-term growth, citing strong macroeconomic fundamentals and domestic institutional support.
title: Market crash: Why investors shouldn't panic

description: Massive protests have erupted across Bangladesh, including Dhaka, against Israel's actions in Gaza. Demonstrators, including students and professionals, are boycotting classes and observing strikes. They denounce the violence, demand an end to the "genocide," and criticize the US support for Israel. Protesters also condemned US crackdowns on pro-Palestinian activism on university campuses.
title: Mass protests in Bangladesh against Israeli attacks on Gaza
MP heart surgery deaths: 'UK doctor' detained amid Damoh Hospital controversy

description: Foreign athletes are competing in the Pyongyang International Marathon for the first time since 2019, with roughly 200 runners from various countries participating. This event is part of festivities marking the birthday of North Korea's founder, Kim Il Sung, and offers a unique interaction with locals.
title: North Korea stages first international marathon in six years

description: Mahendra Singh Dhoni recently spoke about his disciplined childhood in Ranchi, influenced by his strict father, Pan Singh. Dhoni mentioned his fear of his father, which instilled a regimented mindset in him. He reflected on the simplicity of life in Ranchi and emphasised his dedication to India's success in cricket. Dhoni’s parents attended a recent CSK match against Delhi Capitals.
title: 'Papa se darr bohot lagta tha': MS Dhoni recalls his childhood

description: Authorities in Coimbatore have registered an FIR against Pastor D John Jebaraj for sexually assaulting two minor girls at his residence. The incident happened during a party in May 2024 but only came to light recently. Police are searching for the absconding pastor.
title: Pastor booked for sexually assaulting two minor girls in Coimbatore

description: China accused the US of unilateralism and economic bullying with tariffs, urging American companies to address the issue. Beijing implemented retaliatory tariffs and countermeasures while vowing to protect its interests. Chinese officials met with US business representatives, emphasizing cooperation to stabilize the global supply chain and reassuring continued openness to foreign investment.
title: 'Pressure, threats not the way': China says root of tariff problem in US

description: The Rajasthan High Court extended interim bail for Asaram Bapu till July 1 in a rape case, after his previous bail expired. Despite concerns about violating bail conditions, the court granted the extension following an affidavit submission. Asaram remains in a private hospital after surrendering on April 1.
title: Rajasthan HC extends interim bail to Asaram Bapu in rape case

description: Pakistan faced their third penalty for slow over-rate in as many matches, concluding a 3-0 loss in the ODI series against New Zealand. Their ODI team, led by Mohammad Rizwan, was fined for being one over short in the final match. This continuous discipline issue adds to the team's recent struggles and raises concerns ahead of future games.
title: 'Serial-offenders' Pakistan fined again for same offense in NZ ODI series

description: Former India captain Sunil Gavaskar criticises the ECB's decision to retire the Pataudi Trophy, calling it insensitive and disrespectful. Initiated in 2007 to commemorate 75 years of India-England Test cricket, the trophy honoured the Pataudi legacy. Gavaskar urges Indian cricketers to decline having their names associated with any new trophy.
title: Sunil Gavaskar slams ECB over retirement of Pataudi Trophy

description: Despite Rishabh Pant's underwhelming performance in IPL 2025, Lucknow Super Giants' Shahbaz Ahmed remains confident in his captain's abilities. Pant, acquired for a record sum, has struggled to score runs. However, Shahbaz believes Pant is diligently working on his batting and will deliver crucial performances when it matters most.
title: 'There is no change... as always, Rishabh Pant is chilled and relaxed'

description: Global markets are reeling following President Trump's tariff announcements, with significant losses across Europe and Asia. The S&P 500 index futures also declined sharply. Concerns over a potential recession are mounting.
title: Trump tariffs fallout: US markets open deep in red as recession fears loom large

description: Elon Musk criticized Peter Navarro's backing of new tariffs, citing a Thomas Sowell quote. Navarro responded, defending the tariffs and downplaying any conflict with Musk. Navarro highlighted Tesla's reliance on international supply chains, implying Musk's criticism is self-interested.
title: Trump's trade adviser Navarro responds to Musk's tariff criticism

description: A video of Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer has sparked controversy online. During a lighthearted exchange with content creator Sahiba Bali, Iyer's abrupt departure to the gym was perceived by some fans as rude and unprofessional. This incident surfaces amidst scrutiny of Iyer's captaincy, particularly after a recent defeat against Rajasthan Royals where he scored only 10 runs.
title: 'Very rude, very rude': Shreyas Iyer criticised for attitude – Watch

description: A commotion occurred at Sadaqat Ashram in Patna during Rahul Gandhi's visit. Gandhi critiqued the ruling NDA and emphasized Congress’s commitment to uplifting marginalized communities. He also addressed the importance of caste census and criticized Prime Minister Modi's economic system. Gandhi lauded efforts to empower the underprivileged, citing Telangana's increased quotas.
title: Watch: After Rahul's visit, chaos erupts at Cong's Patna office

description: KKR's Venkatesh Iyer is unfazed by his Rs 23.75 crore IPL 2025 price tag, focusing on performance and team contribution. Emphasising effort over value, he's committed to excelling in batting, bowling, and mentorship under new captain Ajinkya Rahane. After a slow start, he bounced back with a strong performance against Sunrisers Hyderabad.
title: 'Whether I'm paid Rs 23cr or 20 lakh ...': Iyer on handling pressure of IPL price tag

description: Dhivya Sashidhar has leveled serious allegations of coercion, abuse, and tax evasion against her estranged husband, Rippling co-founder Prasanna Sankar. Sankar, in turn, has accused Sashidhar of infidelity and making false accusations. The couple is currently engaged in a legal custody battle over their nine-year-old son.
title: Wife of Rippling's co-founder hits back, accuses him of forcing open marriage

description: Danielle Peebles, 42, underwent weight loss surgery in Turkey that led to severe complications and paralysis due to nutritional neuropathy. She lost 95 kg but faced alarming health issues on her return. After extensive treatment and rehabilitation, she slowly regained mobility. Her experience highlights the risks of seeking cheaper medical procedures abroad.
title: Woman paralysed after weight loss surgery: Here's what happened

description: Gujarat Titans' Mohammed Siraj climbs to joint-second place in IPL 2025 Purple Cap race with nine wickets in four matches. Noor Ahmed leads with ten wickets. Nicholas Pooran tops the Orange Cap chart with 201 runs, followed closely by Sai Sudharsan and Mitchell Marsh. Key performances highlight an exciting season ahead in IPL 2025.
title: 'Miyan Magic’ takes Siraj to joint-second in Purple Cap race

description: Kheri police solved the case of a 20-year-old Dalit woman's death, who died after a failed abortion attempt by a quack doctor in a private clinic. Her lover and the quack doctor, along with accomplices, tried to cover up the incident but were apprehended using CCTV footage.
title: UP man arrested for dumping body of dalit woman who died during abortion bid

description: A new online trend allows users to turn their photos into customized action figures using OpenAI's ChatGPT tool. By uploading a photo and providing a detailed character description, users can create realistic action figures with personalized features and accessories. ChatGPT Plus users have more access, while free-tier users can make up to three figures daily.
title: Forget Studio Ghibli, use ChatGPT to turn your photos into realistic action figure

description: The Madras High Court has extended protection for comedian Kunal Kamra over an FIR filed against him, citing harassment by authorities. The court directed Kamra to approach concerned courts, and his interim bail remains effective. Supporters of Eknath Shinde caused damage in response to Kamra's remarks.
title: Joke row: Madras HC extends interim protection for Kunal Kamra till April 17

description: India's top billionaires, including Mukesh Ambani and Gautam Adani, faced a combined $10.3 billion hit due to a major stock market crash driven by global trade conflicts and US recession concerns.
title: Market crash: India’s richest 4 persons lose over $10 billion

description: 'Sikandar' featuring Salman Khan and Rashmika Mandanna, was released on Sunday, March 30 and managed to collect Rs 26 crore on its opening day. The movie crossed Rs 100 crore mark on its 8th day, Sunday, with total earnings reaching Rs 103.07 crore by the following Monday.
title: 'Sikandar' box office sees slow start on 2nd Monday after crossing Rs 100cr

description: A security breach involving a Signal app group chat on diplomatic discussions is blamed on iPhone's auto-suggested contact feature. The incident saw Atlantic Editor-in-Chief Jeffrey Goldberg mistakenly added to a secure chat due to an erroneous contact association, raising concerns about Apple's contact management.
title: What is iPhone auto-suggested contact feature the WH 'blamed' in Signal row

description: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi criticized the NDA-led Bihar government during the Samvidhan Suraksha Sammelan in Patna, highlighting that less than 1% of Biharis are invested in the stock market, thus unaffected by global market crashes. He also addressed social inequalities and emphasized the issues of unemployment and forced migration while campaigning for the upcoming state assembly elections.
title: 'Will destroy fake barrier of 50% quota cap': Rahul bats for Dalits, OBCs in Bihar

description: India’s stock markets experienced a major dip on Monday, with the BSE Sensex and Nifty50 both falling over 4%. Notable companies such as Tata Steel and Infosys saw significant losses. This market turbulence was linked to global uncertainty and newly imposed US tariffs.
title: ‘Black Monday’ meltdown: 10 memes that captured the stock market crash

description: The US President Donald Trump admitted that new US tariffs caused delays in finalizing a deal for selling TikTok. China changed terms due to these tariffs. Trump indicated willingness to reduce tariffs if China agreed to a TikTok sale. A 75-day extension was granted to finalize the deal, requiring Chinese approval.
title: China would have approved TikTok deal in 15 minutes if I ...: Donald Trump

description: The Madhya Pradesh police have instructed officials not to register cases against sex workers caught in raids, emphasizing that only the act of running a brothel is illegal. Sex workers should be treated as victims and not harassed according to the guidelines from the police headquarters.
title: Don't harass sex workers caught in raids, Madhya Pradesh police tells officials

description: US President Trump has initiated a 10 per cent tariff on global imports, significantly impacting trade with 180 countries. Indian exports, notably gems and jewellery, face a flat 26 per cent duty. Numerous industries worldwide, from tech giants to automotive companies, are bracing for price hikes and supply chain disruptions.
title: Gems, gadgets and groceries: Which goods will get costlier after Trump’s tariff move?

description: Gold prices fell to their lowest in over three weeks due to market downturns and recession fears driven by trade conflicts. Investors sold gold to offset losses, while central banks continued to purchase gold, supporting its value.
title: Gold rate today: Yellow metal drops to 3-1/2-week low as market sell-off hits bullion

description: An IndiGo Airlines flight from Mumbai to Varanasi made an emergency landing at Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar's Chikalthana Airport after 89-year-old Sushila Devi from Mirzapur fell ill onboard and later died. Despite medical efforts, she was pronounced dead on arrival. The flight resumed its journey after necessary formalities were completed.
title: IndiGo flight makes emergency landing at Sambhajinagar after woman dies mid-air

description: Indian stock markets plunged over 5% on Monday, tracking global selloffs triggered by trade tensions and new US tariffs. Trump's announcement of sweeping tariffs has led to severe market reactions worldwide. Trump hinted at crashing markets on purpose to influence Federal Reserve policies. The tariffs are raising consumer prices, with economies fearing potential recessions.
title: 'Medicine' or 'engineering': Is Trump letting global markets crash 'on purpose'?

description: Tamil Nadu chief minister MK Stalin criticized Prime Minister Narendra Modi for not addressing the state's concerns about the fishermen issue and the retrieval of the Katchatheevu islet during his visit to Sri Lanka. Despite these setbacks, the Tamil Nadu government plans to continue supporting the fishermen and is implementing new initiatives to aid them.
title: 'TN's demand for retrieving Katchatheevu ignored': Stalin targets PM Modi

description: Police in Varanasi arrested six individuals after a 19-year-old woman claimed she was raped by 23 men over seven days. The incident was reported when she returned home. The police are investigating and continuing operations to arrest the remaining accused persons.
title: Varanasi horror: Teen claims gang-rape by 23 men over 7 days; 6 arrested

description: India's economy is expected to have minimal impact despite the US imposing 26% tariffs on Indian imports. Government officials maintain growth projections between 6.3%-6.8% for 2025-26 fiscal year, though private economists have lowered their forecasts.
title: How much will Indian economy be hit by Trump tariffs?

description: West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee rejects the Supreme Court's decision to cancel over 25,000 school jobs citing recruitment fraud. She questions the political motives behind the ruling, comparing it to the Vyapam scam in BJP-ruled Madhya Pradesh. Banerjee stands by the affected candidates and accuses BJP of targeting Bengal’s education system.
title: 'I can even be jailed for saying this': Mamata meets sacked Bengal teachers

description: A mob in Manipur set fire to the residence of BJP Minorities Morcha president Asker Ali after he endorsed the Waqf Amendment Act. In response to the attack and protests, authorities imposed prohibitory orders in Lilong. Ali later retracted his support for the Act.
title: Manipur BJP Minority Morcha chief’s house set ablaze for supporting Waqf Act

description: On April 1, 2025, American grandmaster Hans Niemann posted about his potential arrival in Paris for the second leg of the Freestyle Chess Grand Slam Tour. However, five days later, he withdrew for 'personal reasons,' disappointing chess fans. Norwegian broadcaster TV 2 suggested heightened anti-cheating protocols influenced his decision. Niemann has been replaced by Nodirbek Abdusattorov.
title: Mystery of Hans Niemann and his withdrawal from Freestyle Chess

description: Namita Thapar, Shark Tank India judge and Emcure Pharmaceuticals Executive Director, reflects on work-life balance and parenting challenges prompted by Netflix's Adolescence series. She stresses the necessity of emotional availability for children and cautions against the repercussions of parents' high work hours and misguided good intentions.
title: Namita Thapar stirs 70hr work-week debate with take on Netflix’s 'Adolescence'

description: Saudi Arabia has temporarily suspended Umrah, business, and family visit visas for 14 countries including India until mid-June 2025 to manage overcrowding and safety during the Hajj season. This measure aims to prevent unauthorized Hajj participation through misuse of other visas. Diplomatic and Hajj-specific visas remain unaffected. Repeat offenders face a five-year entry ban.
title: Saudi Arabia bans visas for 14 countries ahead of Hajj: Why is India on the list?

description: Karnataka home minister G Parameshwara faced criticism for downplaying a molestation incident in Bengaluru, calling such crimes common in big cities. The April 3rd incident, captured on CCTV, showed a man molesting a woman in Bharati Layout. Bengaluru police have filed a suo motu case and are working to locate the victim to formalize the complaint.
title: 'Such incidents happen': Minister's shocking remark after Bengaluru woman molested

description: A man posing as a doctor at a Damoh hospital has been booked for fraud and illegal medical practice, linked to seven patient deaths. The accused, Narendra Yadav, masqueraded as a British doctor and conducted unauthorized medical procedures. Investigations are ongoing to verify the hospital's involvement and government fund misappropriations.
title: Manhunt in MP for 'fake UK doctor' who caused 7 deaths after heart surgeries

description: A group of men with saffron flags allegedly climbed the gate of a dargah in Prayagraj during Ram Navami processions, causing tension. Police intervened and removed the men while investigating the incident. Disciplinary action is being taken against responsible policemen, and legal action is underway.
title: 'Men carrying saffron flags climb gate of dargah in Prayagraj, raise slogans'

description: Rahul Gandhi joined the 'Palayan Roko, Naukri Do' padyatra in Begusarai to highlight issues like unemployment and inflation faced by Bihar's youth. He urged attendees to wear white t-shirts to pressure the government. Union minister Giriraj Singh claimed Congress failed to eradicate poverty during its rule and praised current development under PM Modi and CM Nitish Kumar.
title: Palayan Roko, Naukri Do: Rahul Gandhi launches 'white T-shirt' yatra in Bihar

description: The Jammu and Kashmir Assembly experienced an uproar on Monday over the controversial Waqf (Amendment) Act, as the NC-led alliance opposed the now-law. Assembly Speaker Abdul Rahim Rather cited Rules to bar discussion since the matter is sub-judice, while the opposition called the Assembly's move unconstitutional.
title: Watch: Slogans, ruckus disrupt J&K assembly over Waqf Amendment Act

description: Indian stock markets witnessed a sharp decline due to the Wall Street and global markets crash. Fears of a US recession, driven by new tariffs, are causing investor anxiety. Although India's economic indicators are relatively stable, the global investor retreat is affecting market performance, pushing Nifty towards bear territory.
title: Will Nifty follow US market into the bear zone?

description: Two villagers were suspended for breaching protocols by getting too close to cheetahs and feeding them water, which they filmed and shared on social media. The incident occurred when the cheetahs strayed into agricultural fields, prompting a response from the forest department to guide them back.
title: Heart-warming moment with Cheetahs costs dear; forest guard & driver benched

description: Sunrisers Hyderabad struggle in IPL 2025, securing only one win out of five matches. Head coach Daniel Vettori criticizes their poor fielding and highlights their failure to perform consistently in batting. He mentions the need to assess playing conditions better and handle opponent strategies more effectively for the games to follow.
title: 'We have been poor': SRH coach on team's ordinary start in IPL

description: Former India spinner R Ashwin will not cover Chennai Super Kings' matches on his YouTube channel for the remainder of the IPL season. This decision follows the controversy stirred by an analyst questioning team decisions, leading to a response from CSK head coach Stephen Fleming.
title: Why R Ashwin will not post CSK videos during IPL 2025

description: US President Donald Trump calls for an end to the Russia-Ukraine war, urging Vladimir Putin for a ceasefire. Amid increased Russian attacks and a plea from Ukrainian President Zelenskyy, French President Macron emphasizes the need for strong actions if Russia continues aggression, highlighting the ongoing violence and civilian casualties.
title: 'Don't like them bombing on and on': Trump on Russia-Ukraine peace talks

description: Officials from the Directorate of Enforcement are conducting searches at the residence of Manivannan, the younger brother of Tamil Nadu Minister KN Nehru, in Coimbatore. Manivannan's family owns True Value Home, a property developer firm involved in constructing luxury villas and flats in Tamil Nadu. Simultaneous searches are also taking place in Chennai and Trichy.
title: ED raids TN minister’s brother’s house in Coimbatore; searches on

description: Apple shipped five planes of iPhones and other goods from India to the US in March to dodge new 10% tariffs. The move, meant to maintain prices and manage supply chain impacts, highlights India's growing role in Apple's manufacturing due to better tariff rates compared to China. The US market remains vital despite the added logistical challenges.
title: How Apple flew 5 iPhone flights in 3 days to beat Trump tariffs

description: Yuzvendra Chahal credits his success to MS Dhoni's guidance and looks forward to bowling against him in the IPL. He appreciates the freedom given by his captains, including Shreyas Iyer, and cherishes his partnership with Kuldeep Yadav. Chahal remains optimistic about his future in cricket.
title: I can read 2 or 3 per cent of MS Dhoni's mind: Yuzvendra Chahal

description: Stock market crash today: It’s bloodbath on Monday! BSE Sensex and Nifty50, the Indian equity benchmark indices, crashed in trade on Monday. Both stock market indices plunged over 4%. Why is the stock market falling? We take a look at key reasons:
title: It’s a bloodbath! 5 reasons stock markets are crashing
Kamra moves Bombay HC seeking to quash FIR over Shinde joke row

description: Stock market recommendations: Motilal Oswal Financial Services highlights Trent and HDFC Bank as top stock picks for the week starting April 7, 2025.
title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for today

description: CLSA has downgraded Tata Motors due to potential drops in JLR volumes and diminished EBIT margins. Citigroup suggests a 'sell' for AB Fashion, anticipating no further M&A and high leverage impact. UBS has also downgraded IndusInd Bank amidst concerns, while Jefferies remains optimistic about HDFC Bank's growth.
title: Buy or sell: Stock recommendation by brokers for April 7, 2025

description: Global financial markets plummeted on Monday, spurred by escalating trade tensions between the US and China. Key Asian indices experienced significant drops, mirroring Wall Street’s sharp declines. Investor confidence waned as China imposed hefty tariffs on US imports, sparking concerns about prolonged economic disruption and comparisons to the 2008 financial crisis.
title: Global markets crash as Trump tariff blitz sparks panic and retaliation

description: Manasi Ghosh was crowned the champion of Indian Idol Season 15, winning a cash prize of Rs 25 lakhs and a brand new car. Despite her earlier setback in Super Singer Season 3, she persevered and triumphed. The finale was heartfelt, with touching family moments and notable celebrity appearances.
title: Indian Idol 15 winner: Manasi Ghosh lifts trophy with whopping cash prize of Rs 25L

description: US President Trump stated that a TikTok deal was nearly finalised before China altered its stance in response to new US tariffs. Following an additional 34% tariff on Chinese imports, Trump mentioned that a reduced tariff would expedite the approval. TikTok has extended the deadline to find a non-Chinese buyer by 75 days.
title: 'It was close, but China changed because of tariffs': Trump on TikTok deal

description: Jasprit Bumrah has rejoined the Mumbai Indians camp and is set to play against Royal Challengers Bengaluru in the Indian Premier League 2025. This will be his first match since the Sydney Test against Australia. Coach Mahela Jayawardene is optimistic about Bumrah's impact on the team. The seamer trained with the team on Sunday and video of his toe-crushing yorker has gone viral in no time on social media
title: Jasprit Bumrah back to his menacing best in the nets, yorker video goes viral!

description: A musical performance featuring the RSS 'gana geetham' at a temple managed by the Travancore Devaswom Board has sparked controversy. The Congress demanded action, citing a high court directive against political activities on temple grounds. Allegations include RSS flags at the event, with police investigating the complaint. This incident follows a similar controversy involving CPM songs at another temple festivity.
title: 'Politicising religious spaces': Congress slams RSS song at temple in Kerala

description: Television actors Mugdha Chaphekar and Ravish Desai announced their separation after nine years of marriage. Ravish addressed trolls on his Instagram, requesting privacy and kindness while debunking speculation about the involvement of a third party. They emphasize a mutual, respectful decision to part ways.
title: Ravish Desai slams trolls over separation rumours with Mugdha Chapekar

description: President Donald Trump praised tariffs as crucial for addressing the U.S.'s financial deficits with China and the EU, despite the economic debates they spark. He particularly highlighted the increase to a 54% tariff on Chinese imports and a 25% tariff on imported automobiles, prompting retaliatory measures from affected countries and legal scrutiny over the executive power used.
title: ‘Very beautiful thing’: Donald Trump praises tariffs as markets shudder

description: Muslim residents in Kolkata, Howrah, and Malda displayed communal harmony by welcoming Ram Navami rallyists with flower petals and refreshments. Their gestures of providing water, sharbat, and food were appreciated by the Hindu participants, highlighting unity and mutual respect. This act of kindness aimed at promoting peace stood in contrast to areas affected by communal tensions.
title: 'Cold drinks, warm embraces': Muslims help Hindus beat Ram Navami heat in Bengal

description: Israeli drug dealer Yaniv Benaim, known as Atala, was arrested in Goa for illegally possessing narcotics worth Rs 8.7 lakh. Despite holding an Israeli passport, he was issued an Aadhaar card. Atala was previously arrested in Goa in 2010 and extradited from Peru in 2011. Goa police are investigating the circumstances surrounding his Aadhaar issuance.
title: Israeli ‘drug dealer’ arrested in Goa has Aadhaar card

description: NBA legend Shaquille O’Neal asserted that he would make modern big men Chet Holmgren and Victor Wembanyama quit if they faced him in his prime. O'Neal criticized their reliance on perimeter shooting, arguing it would be their downfall. The discussion highlights the evolution of the NBA, comparing the physical dominance in Shaq’s era with today's floor-spacing and versatility.
title: Shaquille O’Neal says players like Wembanyama, Holmgren wouldn’t survive his era

description: Manasi Ghosh was crowned the champion of Indian Idol Season 15, winning a cash prize of Rs 25 lakhs and a brand new car. Despite her earlier setback in Super Singer Season 3, she persevered and triumphed. The finale was heartfelt, with touching family moments and notable celebrity appearances.
title: Indian Idol 15 winner: Manasi Ghosh lifts trophy with whopping cash prize of Rs 25L

description: Patrick Mahomes almost quit football in high school, revealed by a candid story from his mother. Her encouragement became a pivotal moment, leading him to achieve remarkable high school and college records. This ultimately resulted in Mahomes becoming a three-time Super Bowl champion with the Kansas City Chiefs, highlighting the importance of resilience and support.
title: Patrick Mahomes almost quit football before becoming Chiefs’ franchise quarterback

description: Salman Khan’s latest action-drama Sikandar has crossed the Rs 100 crore mark at the domestic box office by its second weekend despite significant daily drops. The film's highest single-day earnings were on Eid, but it ended its first week with Rs 90.25 crore. Salman predicted audience support, and was quoted saying, '100 crore to paar karva hi denge'.
title: Sikandar box office collection: Salman Khan starrer crosses Rs 100cr mark

description: Trinamool Congress asked school staff to not fall for a conspiracy by CPM and BJP and disrupt CM Mamata Banerjee's address at Netaji Indoor Stadium. TMC said Banerjee aims to untangle issues, while the opposition aims to exploit them politically. The administration will monitor for any provocateurs during the interaction.
title: 'Don’t fall into CPM-BJP conspiracy, hear out CM first': TMC to sacked school staff

description: Muslim women in Varanasi celebrated Ram Navami by performing a grand aarti for Lord Ram, promoting a message of unity and communal harmony. They expressed gratitude for the passing of the Waqf Amendment Bill, viewing it as a blessing of Lord Ram and reinforcing the shared cultural heritage.
title: With Ram Navami aarti, Muslim women in Varanasi endorse Waqf Bill

description: Heatwave conditions are expected to impact New Delhi with temperatures likely to exceed 40 degrees Celsius, predicted by the India Meteorological Department (IMD). A 'yellow' alert indicates awareness of increased temperatures from Monday to Wednesday. The city's maximum temperature on Sunday reached 38.2 degrees Celsius, with rising trends forecasted for the coming days.
title: Delhi heatwave alert: Temperature to rise sharply over next 3 days

description: PM Modi criticized Tamil Nadu's DMK for using English in official letters, urging them to sign in Tamil. He highlighted increased central funding and various development projects in the state, countering claims of insufficient support. Modi also addressed concerns about the Centre's three-language policy.
title: Amid language row, PM Modi asks DMK netas, ‘Why sign letters in English?’

description: Prime Minister Mark Carney joined the Hindu community in Toronto for Ram Navami at the BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir. Celebrating Lord Ram's birth, the event emphasized Hindu representation in Canada. The Hindu Canadian Foundation noted rising anti-Hindu sentiment and urged government action. Carney’s visit comes ahead of the April 28 federal elections.
title: Canadian PM Mark Carney visits BAPS Toronto Temple on Ram Navami

description: In light of recent major pilgrimage events in Uttar Pradesh's sacred triangle, many eateries have transformed their menus to cater to the influx of vegetarian devotees. This shift towards vegetarianism was significantly influenced by the rejuvenation of temple sites and spiritual gatherings, reshaping the culinary landscape and altering food businesses to predominantly serve vegetarian fare.
title: Maha Kumbh flips the plate as eateries go fully veg in UP towns

description: President Droupadi Murmu's historic four-day state visit to Portugal and Slovakia aims to deepen diplomatic relations and multifaceted engagement with these countries. The visit commemorates 50 years of India-Portugal diplomatic ties and includes high-level meetings and discussions on various mutual interests, including the India-EU Free Trade Agreement.
title: President Murmu arrives in Lisbon for four-day visit to Portugal and Slovakia
